name: Currency Exchange Rates Widget
author: Apsara Aruna

sections.description:
The Currency Exchange Rates Widget is a powerful and easy-to-use plugin that allows you to display real-time currency exchange rates on your WordPress site. Stay updated with accurate exchange rates for multiple currencies, directly sourced from a trusted API provider.

With this plugin, you can effortlessly integrate a currency exchange widget into your website, making it convenient for your visitors to access the latest exchange rates. Whether you run a finance blog, an e-commerce store, or a travel website, this plugin is an essential tool for providing up-to-date currency conversion information to your users.

Features

  1. Real-time exchange rates: Get access to the most current currency exchange rates.
    Trusted API source: The plugin retrieves rates from a reliable API provider, ensuring accuracy and reliability.
  2. Currency converter widget: Display a sleek and customizable widget that allows users to convert between different currencies.
  3. Multiple currency support: Supports a wide range of currencies, enabling users to convert between various international currencies.
  4. Easy integration: Simply add the widget to your desired location using a shortcode or a widget area in your theme.
  5. Responsive design: The widget is designed to look great on all devices, ensuring a seamless user experience.
  6. Lightweight and fast: The plugin is optimized for performance, ensuring fast loading times for your website.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the currency-exchange-rates-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
    Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  2. Go to the Currency Exchange Rates Widget settings page to configure the plugin.
  3. Customize the widget appearance and select the currencies you want to display.
  4. Add the widget to your website using the provided shortcode or by placing it in a widget area.
sections.faq:
How do I customize the widget appearance?

You can customize the widget’s appearance by adjusting the settings in the plugin’s admin panel. Change the colors, font styles, and layout to match your website’s design.

Can I display multiple instances of the widget on my site?

Yes, you can add multiple instances of the widget to different pages or widget areas on your site. Each instance can be configured individually to display specific currency pairs.

How often are the exchange rates updated?

The exchange rates are updated in real-time, ensuring that you always have the most accurate and up-to-date information.
